meanings.definition: The Japanese art of folding paper into decorative shapes and figures.
meanings.sent1: I learned how to make origami animals in art class.
meanings.sent2: She displayed her origami creations on the shelf.
meanings.sent3: The origami crane tried to fly but got stuck in a tree.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was an origami puzzle, intricate and delicate.
meanings.sent5: The origami flowers bloomed with vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: An object made by folding paper in the art of origami.
meanings.sent1: He gifted her a beautiful origami butterfly.
meanings.sent2: The origami swan sat gracefully on the table.
meanings.sent3: The origami frog hopped off the desk and onto the floor.
meanings.sent4: His heart was an origami boat, sailing through rough waters.
meanings.sent5: The origami star twinkled under the light.
